home.title: Your Path. Your Future. Simplified.
home.subtitle: One-Stop Personalized Career & Education Advisor for Indian Students
home.continue_journey: Continue your career journey with PathNiti. Access your personalized dashboard, explore colleges, track deadlines, and discover new opportunities.

features.ai_insights: From aptitude assessment to college selection, we guide you through every step with AI-powered insights and government-verified data
features.aptitude_description: Comprehensive quiz to identify your strengths, interests, and suitable career paths with detailed analysis
features.colleges_description: Discover nearby government colleges with detailed information about programs, admissions, and facilities
features.nearby_description: Use Google Maps to find colleges near your location with real-time data, ratings, and interactive maps
features.timeline_description: Never miss important deadlines for admissions, scholarships, and entrance exams with smart reminders
features.career_description: Explore detailed career paths with education requirements, skills needed, and growth opportunities
features.scholarships_description: Find and apply for government scholarships and financial aid opportunities with eligibility matching
features.ai_description: Get personalized recommendations based on your profile, preferences, and market trends

maps.maps_description: Discover nearby government colleges using real-time Google Maps data. Get detailed information about programs, ratings, and facilities all in one place.
maps.location_description: Use your current location or enter any address to find colleges within your preferred radius.
maps.real_time_description: Get up-to-date information including ratings, reviews, photos, and contact details from Google Places.
maps.interactive_description: Explore colleges on an interactive map with custom markers and detailed info windows.
maps.powered_by_google: Powered by Google Maps Places API

cta.join_description: Join thousands of students who have already discovered their path with PathNiti. Start your journey today and unlock your potential.

footer.tagline: Empowering students with personalized career guidance and education resources. Your future starts here.
footer.copyright: © 2025 PathNiti. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ for Indian students.

tts.not_supported: Text-to-speech is not supported in your browser
